alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 5:59PM CDT until July 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Forest County in northeastern Wisconsin... Eastern Vilas County in north central Wisconsin... Florence County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 557 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Phelps to near Eagle River, moving east at 40 mph. Another developing severe storm was located near Boulder Junction. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eagle River, Florence, Phelps, Boulder Junction, Fern, Tipler, Popple River, Headwaters Wilderness, Kentuck Lake Campground and Wisconsin Slough Natural Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Green Bay.
